results.title: 21.11 – 28.12.2025 - Tallinn Christmas Market
results.content: Tallinn Christmas Market On 21 November, Town Hall Square in the heart of Tallinn’s medieval Old Town will once again be transformed into a small piece of a Christmas fairy tale: the traditional Tallinn Christmas Market will open its “imaginary gates” for the 25th time. The Tallinn Christmas Market will remain open until the evening of 28 December, but the Christmas fairy tale does not end there: the Christmas tree will stay on Town Hall Square for several more weeks, and the story continues throughout the festively decorated Old Town! #### Christmas Market at the Town Hall Square in Tallinn, 21 November – 28 December 2025
